title: Art in the Moment: Everyday Extraordinary
description:
>Art in the Moment invites individuals with dementia and their care partners or family members to the Art Institute for creative discussions in the museum galleries and an art-making project in a studio setting. Participants have the opportunity to explore ideas about art and artists during a visit to the museum galleries, experience intellectual stimulation through creative expression, participating in meaningful exchanges in a supportive environment and making connections in a dynamic group setting using personal experiences. This session will focus on Everyday Extraordinary: when objects from everyday life are transformed to the extraordinary.To Register

Please contact Peggy Rubenstein, Alzheimer's Association, Greater Illinois Chapter, at prubenstein@alz.org or (847) 324-0364.

This program is supported by the Cigna Foundation and is free for all participants, including care partners. Learn more about Art in the Moment events.
